plugins.pluginsManager.title: Plugins
plugins.pluginsManager.description: Below are some plugins that can enhance the functionality of Gandi. You can choose to load them according to your own needs.
plugins.pluginsManager.contributing: All plugins are open source and can be viewed and created at {href}.
plugins.customPlugin.title: Custom Plugin
plugins.customPlugin.promptUrlDescriptio: Custom plug-ins can be loaded by entering the address of a JS file (starting with http/https).
plugins.codeFilter.title: Filter Blocks
plugins.codeFind.title: Find Blocks
plugins.devTools.title: Debug Tools
plugins.devTools.tackedVariablesEmpty: Add the monitoring variable by clicking the icon before the variable.
plugins.codeSwitch.title: Block switching
plugins.codeSwitching.description: Right click on a block to switch it to a related block.
plugins.codeSwitching.looks_gotofrontbac: go to front or back layer
plugins.codeBatchSelect.title: Blocks selection
plugins.codeBatchSelect.description: Some more convenient methods for handling blocks. It supports not only block operations but also Frame operations, but it does not support comments.
plugins.codeBatchSelect.fastCopy.descrip: Hold down the {code} key, select the blocks you want to copy, move the mouse, and the block being dragged by the mouse will be the copied block.
plugins.codeBatchSelect.fastSelect.descr:
This feature requires the 'box select blocks' function to be enabled first. 
Hold down the {code} key, then you can click to select any single block. Once selected, drag any of the selected blocks to move all selected blocks.
plugins.codeBatchSelect.boxSelect.descri: Hold down the {code} key in the blank area of the script area and drag the mouse to select multiple blocks.
plugins.terminal.title: Terminal
plugins.folder.title: Folder
plugins.folder.description: Right-click a sprite to create a folder or move it to an existing folder by dragging and dropping. Folders are indicated by adding '[folderName]//' at the beginning of sprite names
plugins.dropdownSearchable.title: Searchable Dropdown Blocks
plugins.dropdownSearchable.description: This plugin allows you to search and filter options within dropdown menus and also search for and select blocks within input fields.
plugins.historicalVersion.title: History
plugins.historicalVersion.maximum: Maximum number of restore points for a single project
plugins.historicalVersion.interval: Interval for automatically creating restore points
plugins.statistics.title: Status Bar
plugins.statistics.description: Count the number of blocks and file size of the project
plugins.witcatBlockinput.title: Block Input
plugins.witcatBlockinput.description: Make your block input support multiple-lines, smoother rendering, custom render block widths, supports turning block input into squares, and of course, advanced input fields!
witcat.blockinput.title: Block Input
witcat.blockinput.description: Make the input box of blocks more possible!
plugins.kukemcBeautify.title: Gandi beautification
plugins.fastInput.title: Fast Input
plugins.fastInput.description:
Inspired by ScratchAddons' InsertBlocksByName, this plugin adds the feature of using Pinyin abbreviations for input in Chinese language. 
💡Usage: Hold down the Shift key and click to open the block input window in the code area, enter the block name or Pinyin abbreviation, use the arrow keys and Enter key to navigate, use the Tab key for auto-completion, and hold down the Shift key to drag the block to prevent the list from closing.
plugins.betterSpriteMenu.title: Better Sprite Menu
plugins.betterSpriteMenu.layouts.label: Sprite Selector layout:
plugins.betterSpriteMenu.description: Give the sprites selector a new (and better) look!
plugins.inspiro.guest.name: Me
plugins.inspiro.audio.name: Music Magician
plugins.inspiro.audio.desc: Describe your idea below👇, and I will compose a heavenly melody based on it 🎵
plugins.inspiro.image.name: Masterpiece Creator
plugins.inspiro.image.desc: Describe your idea below👇, and I will turn it into a beautiful painting 🎨
plugins.inspiro.title: AI Assistant
plugins.inspiro.intro: Your all-in-one AI assistant in Gandi IDE! Whether you want to generate stunning images, create melodious music, or need inspiration to bring your creative dreams to life, Inspiro Assistant offers endless possibilities.
plugins.customCss.name: Custom Color Theme
plugins.customCss.title: Custom Color Theme
plugins.customCss.description: Load various beautiful Gandi color themes! Choose from light and dark styles! Plus advanced customization features~
plugins.customCss.load.description: To prevent stacking, only one file is supported. If you need to load multiple, please merge them
plugins.customCss.mainColorDesc: Main background color, applied to menu bars and most interface elements
plugins.customCss.accentColorDesc: UI element color, applied to buttons, borders, and other interactive elements
plugins.extensionManager.title: Extension Manager
plugins.voiceCooperation.title: Voice Cooperation
plugins.voiceCooperation.description: Voice cooperate with your team members!
plugins.voiceCooperation.errorMsg: Failed to join the voice channel, please try again later.
plugins.voiceCooperation.errorMsgNet: Failed to join the voice channel, please check your network connection.
plugins.voiceCooperation.errorMsgPermiss: Failed to join the voice channel, please check your microphone permission.
plugins.voiceCooperation.errorMsgNotSupp: Your browser does not support voice calls.
plugins.voiceCooperation.errorNotInCoope: You are not in the collaboration project, so you cannot use the voice call.
plugins.voiceCooperation.pushToTalk.desc: Press and hold a key on the keyboard to speak
plugins.voiceCooperation.voiceActivity.d: Automatically turn on the microphone based on voice
plugins.voiceCooperation.voiceActivity.s: The higher the value, the lower the threshold for the microphone to turn on
plugins.blockSharing.title: Block Sharing
plugins.blockSharing.description: Share your blocks to Creator Academy or anywhere else, and import to Gandi with one click
plugins.blockSharing.noBluePrint: This article does not provide a blueprint
plugins.blockSharing.noDemo: This article does not provide a demo
plugins.blockSharing.noArticle: This article does not provide additional reading
plugins.costumePiskel.title: Piskel Costume Editor
plugins.costumePiskel.description: Create pixel-style sprites will become easier.
plugins.dataCategoryTweaks.title: Data category tweaks
plugins.dataCategoryTweaks.moveReporters: Move data blocks above variables list
plugins.mobileCodeBatchSelect.title: Gandi Mobile Compatibility
plugins.mobileCodeBatchSelect.descriptio: Provides more convenient ways to operate scripts on mobile.
plugins.mobileCodeBatchSelect.fastCopy.d: Press a block, then before dragging, press a second finger. The dragged block will be a copied version.
Pinch on an empty area in the script workspace to zoom in and out.
Double-tap and hold with one or two fingers on an empty area, then drag to select multiple blocks. Double-tap on an empty area to deselect.
plugins.cleanPro.title: Clean Blocks Pro
plugins.cleanPro.description: Clean Blocks Pro! Quickly delete unused blocks and variables~
plugins.cleanPro.docs:
Usage: 
 After enabling the plugin, right-click in the script area to see the menu item to clean up unused blocks and variables~
plugins.cleanPro.docs.title: Plugin Documentation
plugins.cleanPro.showCleanHeadlessBlocks: Display the option to Delete unused blocks in the context menu
plugins.cleanPro.showCleanUnusedVariable: Display the option to Delete unused variables in the context menu
plugins.cleanPro.showCleanAllMenu: Enable "Delete Unused Blocks and Variables" context menu
plugins.cleanPro.showCleanAllMenuDesc: Integrates all plugin functionality. It is recommended to enable only this option. Enabling separate options is only for users who need to keep test blocks or variables.
plugins.cleanPro.showCleanWholeProjectMe: This function will clean up unused blocks and variables in all sprites, including the Stage
plugins.cleanPro.cleanWholeProject: Clean Whole Project (Unused Blocks and Variables)
